titles: Tvvo sermons vvherein we are taught, 1. Hovv to get, 2. How to keepe, 3. How to vse a good conscience. Preached in Alldermanbury Church, London. Not heretofore published. By Robert Harris.
author: Harris, Robert, 1581-1658.
publisher: Printed by T. B[rudenell] for Iohn Bartlet, and are to be sold at his shop in Cheape-side at the Gilded-Cup,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
